messages.subject: Re:Book
messages.msgSnippet: ... Thanks, Sandra.  I m still hoping you ll look the book over for a little blurb on the back cover.  I seem to be way behind with my schedule .  I did do a
messages.messageBody:
> << www.Homeschoolingreflections.com >>
>
> That's great, Connie!
>
> I'm going to add your page to my unschooling page too.
>
> Sandra
>
>
>
Thanks, Sandra. I'm still hoping you'll look the book over for a little
blurb on the back cover. I seem to be way behind with my "schedule". I did do a
hike on the Appalachian Trail, but then needed to come home early,
unexpectedly, as my son Devin had a serious accident. He's had surgery,and has re-hab.
They are thinking he will re-gain the use of his right hand, but it will take
many months.

When the Inn owner was shuttling me to the bus so that I could get home, he
said my son should realize how lucky he was to have a mom that would cut her
hike short, because he was hurt.

I didn't say anything, but I can't imagine a mom who wouldn't need to get
home to an injured child. I don't think hiking by myself for days with Devin on
my mind would have done anything but make me crazy!!

Connie



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
